TextView.android:text:
Users need to click on Play button in order to play the game. Before playing, the phone would scan for Nearby PCs via Bluetooth scanning. After finding a nearby PC and connecting to it, User can start Playing Ice Showdown, Users need to score at least 3 out of the 5 balls placed in the ice field in order to win the round. This game can be played until the user decides to stop the game, whoever has the higher win rounds, would win the game. In any case, if the phone is disconnected From the PC, there is a button for users To click on to reconnect to the PC.
Have Fun Pooling!
